title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working?
body:
So I've had league for a while now, and just recently I tried to open the game and a popup showed up with the title "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working" and windows was trying to find the problem. It's telling me a problem caused it to stop working correctly but no solution, nor was a clue as to WHAT stopped it from working was given. Any ideas?

Edit: I've uninstalled and reinstalled multiple times as well, the problem still keeps occurring upon opening the launcher.

Edit #2: I ran it as an administrator and it fixed the problem.

replies.body: Running as administrator worked in this case because the patcher was being blocked from launching, which results in the kernel error.  Running as admin may be a temporary workaround, meaning you'd have to run it that way each time.  For a more permanent fix, I also recommend going over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to configure your OS settings to allow access.  Hope that helps!
